#summary &boxul; character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesB

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxul;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxUL;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/255d/index.htm U+0255D].
  * `&boxUl;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/255c/index.htm U+0255C].
  * `&boxuL;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/255b/index.htm U+0255B].
  * `&boxul;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2518/index.htm U+02518].
